meanings.definition: Capable of being placed on top of something else and matching exactly.
meanings.sent1: The two puzzle pieces were superimposable, fitting together perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The identical twins looked so similar that they were superimposable.
meanings.sent3: The superimposable keys on the keyboard made it easy to type quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her memories of the event were superimposable, each detail matching perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The artist created a superimposable image by layering two photos on top of each other.

meanings.definition: Able to be overlaid or placed on top of something else without any differences.
meanings.sent1: The transparent film was superimposable on the document, showing the text underneath.
meanings.sent2: The virtual reality headset displayed a superimposable image over the real world.
meanings.sent3: The superimposable stickers made decorating the notebook a fun and easy task.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were superimposable, each idea seamlessly blending into the next.
meanings.sent5: The layers of paint created a superimposable effect, giving the artwork depth and dimension.
